c - Variable in class WordleController

calculateUserStats(List<String>, int, boolean) - Static method in class WordleModel
Method that calculates the new user information based on their performance on the current day's Wordle.
canPlayWordle(String, String) - Static method in class WordleModel
Method that checks if the specified user exists in the SQL table, and if they have played the Wordle for the specified date
checkForPlayed(String, String) - Static method in class WordleModel
Method that checks the SQL table to see if the specified user has played on the specified day to prevent multiple plays per day per user
checkForUser(String) - Static method in class WordleModel
Method that checks if a userID already exists in the SQL table
checkNameAvailability(String) - Method in class Client
method that returns true if the username is not taken OR it is a returning player that hasn't played a series today
checkUserAvail(String[], DatagramPacket) - Static method in class Server
checkUserAvail takes a String array that contains a username and check with the database to see if the player has played in the tournament today.
checkWord(String[], DatagramPacket) - Static method in class Server
checkWord takes a string array that contains a guess and a round number and checks how many letters are in the correct position, how many are in the incorrect position, and how many are not in the word at all It sends back a packet with 5 ints varying between 0 and 2, where 2 is correct position, 1 exists in the word, but incorrect position, and 0 is not in the word
checkWord(String, int) - Method in class Client
method that checks a word to see if it matches the daily word for a given round
checkWordValid(String[], DatagramPacket) - Static method in class Server
checkWordValid takes a string array containing a 5-length string and checks with the database to make sure that it is a valid word
checkWordValidity(String) - Static method in class WordleModel
Method that checks if the user inputted word is a valid word to run through the Wordle game by checking if the input exists in a word table in SQL database
